definition: second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

sentences.english: Acute toxicity test, mutation test and single-cell gel electrophoresis(SCGE)were used.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解三氯乙醛的毒性和致突變作用。

sentences.english: The double bond is attacked by the oxygen, forming aldehydes and carbonyls.
sentences.chinese: 雙結合受氧的攻擊形成乙醛和碳酸基。

sentences.english: Alcohol dehydrogenase An enzyme that converts ethanol into acetaldehyde (ethanal).
sentences.chinese: 把乙醇轉化爲乙醛的酶。

sentences.english: The synthesis of glyoxylic acid by means of oxidation glyoxal with nitric acid is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了由乙二醛硝酸氧化法合成乙醛酸的方法。

sentences.english: Glyoxysomes are particularly well known in germinating fatly seeds.
sentences.chinese: 人們已經知道，萌發的含油種子中有乙醛酸循環體。

sentences.english: It is reported that the electrolytic process of oxalic to glyoxalic acid by electroreduction on titanium cathode in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道在鈦陰極上草酸還原制乙醛酸的電解工藝。

sentences.english: MHP was mainly generated from the photolysis of acet aldehyde formed in thee degradation of ethane.
sentences.chinese: MHP主要來自乙烷降解過程中的中間物乙醛的光解。

sentences.english: Diisobutyl acetal was synthesized by the condensation of paraldehyde and iso-butyl alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 以三聚乙醛和異丁醇爲原料，合成了二異丁基乙縮醛。

sentences.english: The reasons and countermeasures for the high acetaldehyde content in the bottle grade polyester chips are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討瓶級聚酯切片乙醛含量高的原因和採取的對策。

sentences.english: Cankered material can produce effluvial carcinogen aldehyde . 2.
sentences.chinese: 腐爛的物質可以產生惡臭的致癌物質乙醛。

sentences.english: Acetaldehyde is the intermediate product in the process of alcohol metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 酒精在體內代謝的中間產物爲乙醛。

sentences.english: Acetaldehyde is toxic and has been shown to damage DNA.
sentences.chinese: 乙醛是有毒物質，會損害人體的DNA。

sentences.english: But you do not forget that half of the Chinese people with the mutation of aldehyde dehydrogenase.
sentences.chinese: 可您別忘了，中國人一半帶有突變的乙醛脫氫酶。

sentences.english: Decreasing light intensity , the degradation of acetaldehyde and toluene both decreased.
sentences.chinese: 光通量減弱使乙醛和甲苯的降解率均下降。

sentences.english: Acetaldehyde almost exists ubiquitously and is harmful to people.
sentences.chinese: 乙醛廣泛存在於環境中，危害人體健康。

sentences.english: Formaldehyde mixed with acetaldehyde and gradually adding sodium hydroxide as reactor.
sentences.chinese: 甲醛和乙醛混合，逐漸加入氫氧化鈉到反應裝置。

definition: ethanol C2H5OH/same as alcohol 酒精
alcohol/ethanol CH3CH2OH/ethyl alcohol/also written 乙醇/grain alcohol
catabolism (biology)/metabolic breaking down and waste disposal/dissimilation
